description: The start of Sale's Champions Cup tie against Toulouse was delayed by 40 minutes after a parachutist had to be rescued from the roof of the stadium.
title: Parachutist: Sale v Toulouse delayed after paratrooper gets stuck in roof
title_page: Parachutist: Sale v Toulouse delayed after paratrooper gets stuck in roof - BBC Sport
maintext:
The start of Sale's Champions Cup tie against Toulouse was delayed by 40 minutes after a parachutist had to be rescued from the roof of the stadium.
Captain Yannick Trouillet was supposed to be delivering the match ball but went off course and was left dangling from the roof of the Stadium de Toulouse after his parachute got snagged in the awning.
Supporters in the packed stand some 30 metres below were moved as a precaution, as officials worked out how to free the captain.
Stadium staff and Toulouse's lion mascot gathered post protectors to place underneath Trouillet as a potential safety mat, and a large children's inflatable rugby pitch was brought in from outside the stadium to provide further cushioning.
